#cox proportional hazards model
```{r}
library(survival)
```
```{r}
library(survminer)
```
```{r}
cox_fit <- coxph(Surv(time, status2) ~ age + sex + ph.ecog, data = lung)
summary(cox_fit)
```
#check proportional hazards assumption
```{r}
cox.zph(cox_fit)
```
#vissualize cox model predictions
```{r}
ggadjustedcurves(cox_fit, data = lung, variable = "sex")
```
